ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats not a bad idea Rokenn... although one consideration would be the cost of pearls after doing that a hundred times not to mention mage mana-levels. Plus, I
ygData.messageBody:
Thats not a bad idea Rokenn... although one consideration would be the cost
of pearls after doing that a hundred times not to mention mage mana-levels.
Plus, I believe (although I am not sure) there is always a "small chance"
that CotH won't erase aggro? I guess it all depends on how quickly you want
to do the plane.

Halana/Tani

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 8:11 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
>
>
> Only way I can think of is to group with a non-kos Magician
> and have him CoH
> you after you have completed the pull.
>
>
> Rokenn
>
